column4: Good Morning :); I recently installed xubuntu-desktop package in my ubuntu to obtain the xfce desktop environment. I dont know what happened but after a few logins, i cannot longer see the panel bar on the screen, i can just see the desktop with the icons. Can someone help me please?
the panel may be started wutg the command 'xfpanel' I think... try xf<tab> in a terminal to see what commands exist.
normally the 32bit and 64bit packages are not interchangeable
about every app ive ever used has 64bit versions now.
try running them from the shell?  ive never seen a .i386 extension used on a executable. oris it a shell script?
it is suppossed to be a Urban Terror executable. The Urban Terror documentation says to run it as an executable. I have also tried to open the file with konsole and akonadi but i still get nothing :(
you  may want to put it somewhere with no spaces in the paths also
or 'cd' to where the binary is at.
i have cd to the directory where the binary is at, chmod it but still i am not allowed to access it apparently
i woudl think it would use the normal http and ftp ports since it transfers files over http or ftp.
which are those?
http is like 80 and i forget qwhat ftp is.. why does it matter?
by the way, i know this is off topic but do you know which ports are used by windows file sharing?
those are 'samba/netbios ports'
look in /etc/services
hmmm i think i'll keep googling thanks :D
ive seen that mentioned in the ffmpeg/mencoder faq/docs befor.. but no idea on a gui tool to do it
then you need to reencode it I imagine. ffmpeg/mencoder can do it  - but the subtitlke reabablity on youtube is often very poor
from windows be sure to defrag/scandisk  - and depending on the version of windows.. windoes Does have tools to resize NTFS that can work a lot faster then gparted does for me
it's a clean windows installation, factory default.
so? still same procedure.. defrag/scan/try  the windows features..   then id try gparted again
ok :) thank you
